## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) which is currently working and has an inventory of copper-ore and copper-plate.

### Burner Mining Drill at position (42.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 42.0, -83.0) which is currently working and has an inventory of coal.

### Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -81.5)
Consists of the following entities:

### Burner Inserter at position (42.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter (position 42.5, -80.5) which is currently waiting for source items and has an inventory of coal.

### Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -81.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter (position 43.5, -81.5) which is currently waiting for space in destination and has an inventory of coal.

### Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position -14.5, -48.5) which is currently normal and has an inventory of iron-ore.

### Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position -15.0, -50.0) which is currently working and has an inventory of coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the target entity has enough space for the items you are trying to insert. If the entity is full or waiting for space, the insertion will fail.

### Errors when using entities with no fuel
- Check the fuel status of your entities before attempting to use them. If they are out of fuel, they will not operate.

### Errors when placing items into a tile occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors when trying to insert items into a furnace with no ingredients
- Make sure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to operate before attempting to insert items. If it lacks ingredients, it will not function.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Verify that the source items are available and accessible to the inserters. If they are not, the inserters will remain in a waiting state.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the current execution steps.

### Important Variables
- `copper-ore`: int
- `copper-plate`: int
- `coal`: int
- `iron-ore`: int
- `wood`: int
- `iron-plate`: int
- `iron-gear-wheel`: int
